title: Huntress's Buckler
summaries: The Huntress's Buckler is a Hardmode shield accessory that increases the player's maximum number of sentries by one and increases summon damage by 10%. It is dropped by the Ogre during the Old One's Army event with a 16.66% / 25% - 8.33% / 12.5% (T2) or 8.33% - 4.17% (T3) chance.

statistics.Tooltip:
Increase your max number of sentries by 1
Increases summon damage by 10%
statistics.Sell: 3
